title: A Psychedelic Bridge from Modern Reductionism to Atlantean Catastrophism is Eroding the Secular Myth
description: Typical modern normies are awakened to the awe and wonder of ancient mythology by the use of psychedelic drugs, and are using the tools of modern science to validate these stories. It’s not just Creationists vs. Darwinist’s anymore - there is a spectrum of opinions between those camps, and you don’t have to resort to postmodernism to hold a heterodox opinion.
